column1: Test Cases of Email Verification Feature

column2: Verify that proper error message is showing when pass invalid verification token
column3:
1. Navigate to Site URL
2. Enter verification url with invalid token in browser tab
column5: User should receive error message of 'Invalid email verification link'.

column2: Verify that proper error message is showing when pass not pass email verification token
column3:
1. Navigate to Site URL
2. Enter verification url with blank token in browser tab
column5: User should receive error message of 'Verification token not found in query string.'.
